Neoplanet To Integrate Flash

20 Sep 1999

The people at Neoplanet have announced that they'll begin bundling Macromedia Flash as part of their standard distribution.

\nIts always nice when a company integrates cool technology like Flash into its product.

\nCheck out the press release or go download it now!
